title: Facebook updates internal employee communication policies
text: Facebook Inc on Thursday updated its policies to impose restrictions on employees' ability to debate social and political issues internally.

title: Facebook And Instagram Appeared To Go Down For Some Users Thursday Afternoon
Facebook issues new rules on internal employee communication
text: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg on Thursday outlined to employees a new set of principles to guide debates and conversations within Workplace, the company's internal social network.

title: Facebook Is Serious About AR, VR, Analyst Says After Connect Conference
text: Social media giant Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) hosted its Facebook Connect Conference Wednesday to outline the next steps in the company's long-term push toward augmented and virtual reality technology, according to BofA Securities.

title: Facebook tries to clean up Groups with new policies
text: Facebook this morning announced a series of new rules designed to further penalize those who violate its Community Standards, specifically around Facebook Groups. It also introduced rules meant to crack down on the spread of misinformation through these more private networks.

title: Reid Hoffman on Facebook: There's room for something new
text: LinkedIn Founder Reid Hoffman and Mark Pincus, founder of Zynga, join 'Squawk Alley' to talk about major tech firms like Facebook and Apple, even as both companies face antitrust allegations.

title: Facebook to limit the spread of groups tied to violence and health advice
text: Facebook announced new policies that will limit the spread of private groups on its social network that focus on giving users health advice as well as groups with ties to violence.

title: FTC reportedly preparing possible antitrust lawsuit against Facebook
text: Facebook’s dominance in the social networking space has reportedly put it in the Federal Trade Commission’s crosshairs. The tech giant could be hit by an antitrust lawsuit as soon as the end of this year, the Wall Street Journal reports, as the regulator examines whether Facebook has used its market dominance to quash competition.

title: Facebook launches Facebook Business Suite, an app for managing business accounts across Facebook, Instagram and Messenger
text: Facebook this morning launched a new app designed to make it easier for businesses to manage their pages and profiles across Facebook, Instagram and Messenger in a single place. The app, Facebook Business Suite, combines access to the business’s key updates and priorities, and offers a way to draft and schedule feed posts for both […]

title: Missed Out on Snowflake? Here Are 3 IPOs That Came Back for You
text: If you think this week's shiny new star won't come down you may want to check with folks who got in on the Peloton, Netflix, and Facebook debuts.

title: Facebook and The New York Times Team Up for Augmented Reality News Project
text: Traditional and new media meet in an effort to deliver next-generation news content.

title: As Main Street crisis worsens, Facebook launches new small business platform
text: Facebook has been focused on small business amid large brand boycotts of the social media and advertising giant, and it has a new platform to help Main Street at a time of crisis.

title: Facebook Partners With Eyewear Giant To Make 'Smart Glasses'
text: Facebook Inc (NASDAQ: FB) has entered into a multiyear collaboration with EssilorLuxottica to develop smart glasses.

title: Facebook's Oculus Quest 2 VR Headset Comes With Better Specs And Lower Cost Than Predecessor
text: The Virtual Reality space is gearing up for the release of Facebook Inc's (NASDAQ: FB) wireless VR headset – the Oculus Quest 2.
